cassandraConfig: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(keyspace -> advancedspark, table -> item_ratings)
itemRatingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [userId: int, itemId: int, rating: int, timestamp: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Train the ALS model
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS

val rank = 10
val maxIterations = 20
val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val als = new ALS()
  .setRank(rank)
  .setRegParam(convergenceThreshold)
  .setUserCol("userId")
  .setItemCol("itemId")
  .setRatingCol("rating")

val model = als.fit(itemRatingsDF)

model.setPredictionCol("confidence")

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS
rank: Int = 10
maxIterations: Int = 20
convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01
als: org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS = als_7283aa6a00a4
model: org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALSModel = als_7283aa6a00a4
res348: model.type = als_7283aa6a00a4

paragraphs.title: Show User Factors generated by ALS Model
Show Item Factors Generated by aLS Model
convert ALS item factors into K-Means Feature vectors
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row

val itemFeatureVectorsDF = model.itemFactors.map(row => (row.getInt(0), row.getSeq[Float](1)))
  .mapValues(row => Vectors.dense(row(2)))
  .toDF("id", "features")
  .as("itemFeatureVectors")

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
itemFeatureVectorsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: int, features: vector]

paragraphs.title: Train K-Means Cluster Model
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans

val kmeans = new KMeans()
  .setK(5)
  .setMaxIter(10)
  .setFeaturesCol("features")
  .setPredictionCol("clusterId")

val kmeansModel = kmeans.fit(itemFeatureVectorsDF)

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans
kmeans: org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans = kmeans_2b9cb123d9a6
kmeansModel: org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeansModel = kmeans_2b9cb123d9a6

paragraphs.title: Evaluate K-Means Cluster Model Using Within Set Sum of Squared Errors (WSSSE)
paragraphs.text:
val WSSSE = kmeansModel.computeCost(itemFeatureVectorsDF)

println("Within Set Sum of Squared Errors = " + WSSSE)
